entry.title: Generac 7228 18KW Guardian Home Backup Generator w/WiFi and Home Transfer Switch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Generac
Type: Generators
Price: 5647.00

Product Downloads

Brochure

Specifications

Owner's Manual

Wi-Fi Manual

Warranty

Features
  • Air-cooled home backup generator that runs on a Generac 816cc G-Force twin-cylinder engine with a 3600 RPM max. The aluminum cylinder block and sturdy casing make it very durable
  • The model features a dual-fuel carburetion system that runs on liquid propane or natural gas. It produces 18,000 watts on LP and 17,000 on natural gas. Changing from LP to natural gas is easy
  • The oil tank stores up to 2.2 quarts / 2.1 liters of oil. The full pressure oil lubrication system allows the engine to run efficiently for long hours. It will also extend the maintenance intervals
  • The automatic transfer switch has a NEMA/UL 3R aluminum enclosure and can be installed both indoors and outdoors
  • Choose from 100amp 16-circuit switch or a 200amp service rated smart switch
  • The ATS features smart management modules to manage power for air-conditioners and similar heavy loads
  • Smart Management Module manages up to 4 air conditioners efficiently. The load management system protects the engine from overload so the generator never shuts down when you need it the most.
  • G-Flex variable speed technology allows the air-cooled gas engine to operate at various speeds to adjust to the changing load conditions
  • This all-new Guardian 7226 generator can power up air conditioners, refrigerators, furnaces, sump pumps, microwaves, computers, monitors, TV, lights, and more
  • TRUE POWER TECHNOLOGY makes it perfect for use with modern electronics and appliances with micro-circuitry such as HVACs, refrigerators, laptops, cell phones, and tablets
  • The model is cETL/ETL, cUL2200/UL2200 certified
What's in The Box
  • Generac 18KW GUARDIAN Generator - 7228
  • 200 Amp Whole Home Transfer Switch
  • Owners Manual
Warranty
  • 5 Year Limited Factory Warranty
  • 30 Day Satisfaction Guaranteed
Specifications
SKU 7228
Brand Generac
Max Continuous Rated Watts(LP) 18000
Max Continuous Rated Watts(NG) 17000
Rated Voltage 240
Total Harmonic Distortion less than 5 percent
Phase 1
Number of Rotor Poles 2
Rated AC Frequency 60 hz
Power Factor 1
Main Line Circuit Breaker 80 amp
Sound Output in dB(a) at 23 ft w/ Normal Load 65
Sound Output in dB(a) at 23 ft w/ Quiet Test Low Speed 55
Engine
Engine Type G-Force 800 Series
Cylinders 2
Displacement 816cc
Lifter Type Hydraulic
Ignition Type Solid State w/ magneto
Governor Type Electronic
Compression Type 9.5-1
Starter 12 VDC
Cylinder Block Aluminum w/ Cast Iron Sleeve
Valve Arrangement Overhead Valve
Oil Capacity Including Filter Approx 2.2 qt / 2.1 L
Operating RPM 3600
Fuel Consumption Full Load(NG) 247 ft/hr
Fuel Consumption Full Load(LP) 110 ft/hr
Mode Buttons Auto, Manual, Off
Dimensions (LxWxH) 48 x 25 x 29 in
Weight 191 lbs
GENERAC GUARDIAN SERIES 18KW GENERATOR FEATURES AND BENEFITS
This generator provides essential circuit power protection for your home during a power outage, ensuring that essential appliances maintain power. This standby generator is automatic and offers protection year-round, for less than the cost of central air conditioning.
Every Guardian Series home standby generator comes with Mobile Link™ Remote Monitoring. Remote Monitoring is FREE, and allows you to monitor the status of your generator from anywhere in the world. Use a smartphone, PC, or tablet to access generator information, such as the current operating status and maintenance alerts. By connecting your account you have access to authorized service dealers for fast, friendly, and proactive service.
Generac generators are ideal for weathering storms and power outages. Their automatic backup power gives you piece of mind that your home and appliances are protected.
Generac generators and engines are designed, engineered and assembled in the USA using domestic and foreign parts.
The Generac G-Force Engine is built to handle the stressors of generator use. This results in power that’s more reliable and requires less routine maintenance than competitor engines. Generac’s new G-Force engine is purpose built and pressure-lubricated. It features hydraulic lifters, which improve engine performance and extending the life of the product. (Hydraulic lifters only available on the 13 & 16 kW.)

entry.title: Generac RG08045ANAX 80 kw Protector Series Standby Generator Natural Gas w/ WiFi
entry.summary:
Vendor: Generac
Type: Generators
Price: 23917.00

Features
  • Generac Engine Purpose-built in Wisconsin, USA. Utilizes a dual-valve ultra-low pressure fuel delivery system and intelligent proprietary engine controls that manage performance functions to ensure peak efficiency in all temperature ranges and elevations
  • True Power Technology Delivers utility-grade power quality with less than 5 percent total harmonic distortion (THD) for the clean, smooth operation of sensitive electronics and appliances
  • Single-phase, 120/240 V
  • Small Footprint - Generac liquid-cooled product packs more power into a small footprint - ideal when space is a premium. The neutral styling, color, and small footprint fits unobtrusively into landscaping
  • Generac Evolution Controller is visible and accessible without opening the generator enclosure and allows users to monitor and track maintenance intervals to ensure the generator is always in top operating condition
  • 18 in. Offset. Generators can be installed just 18 in. from a structure - ideal for areas with tight lot lines or other space constraints. (Only if located away from doors, windows, fresh air intakes, and otherwise directed by local codes. Review install guide for details.)
  • Tough, Durable All-Aluminum Enclosures: Our RhinoCoat powder-coated finish helps make corrosion-resistant aluminum perfect for all weather conditions - shielded from the inside out - a durable coating protects the internal frame from rust
  • Quiet-Test Self-Test Mode runs at a lower, quieter RPM for a five or twelve-minute test, to ensure the system is running properly while consuming less fuel. Quiet-Test Self-Test mode can be programmed to run weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly
  • Mobile Link Connectivity allows you to monitor the status of your generator from anywhere in the world using any device. Compatible with the Mobile Link 4G LTE cellular accessory (sold separately)
  • 5-Year Limited Warranty for automatic standby generators. Extended warranty options
What's in The Box
  • 80kW Standby Generator
  • Owner's Manual
Warranty
  • 5 Year Limited Factory Warranty
  • 30 Day Satisfaction Guaranteed
Specifications
SKU RG08045ANAX
Brand Generac
Volts 120/240
Starting System 12v Auto Start
CC 4500
Engine RPM 1800 RPM
Phase Single
Rated Watts 80000
Fuel Type Natural Gas
NG Fuel Consumption at 50 percent Load 534 ft/hr
NG Fuel Consumption at 50 percent Load 534 ft/hr
Rated Amps 333
Decibel Rating 68
Circuit Breaker Size 400 amps
Length 97.4 in
Width 38 in
Height 48.9 in
Weight 1912 lbs

GENERAC GUARDIAN SERIES 7.5KW GENERATOR FEATURES AND BENEFITS
This generator provides essential circuit power protection for your home during a power outage, ensuring that essential appliances maintain power. This standby generator is automatic and offers protection year-round, for less than the cost of central air conditioning.
Every Guardian Series home standby generator comes with Mobile Link™ Remote Monitoring. Remote Monitoring is FREE, and allows you to monitor the status of your generator from anywhere in the world. Use a smartphone, PC, or tablet to access generator information, such as the current operating status and maintenance alerts. By connecting your account you have access to authorized service dealers for fast, friendly, and proactive service.
Generac generators are ideal for weathering storms and power outages. Their automatic backup power gives you piece of mind that your home and appliances are protected.
Generac generators and engines are designed, engineered and assembled in the USA using domestic and foreign parts.
The Generac G-Force Engine is built to handle the stressors of generator use. This results in power that’s more reliable and requires less routine maintenance than competitor engines. Generac’s new G-Force engine is purpose built and pressure-lubricated. It features hydraulic lifters, which improve engine performance and extending the life of the product. (Hydraulic lifters only available on the 13 & 16 kW.)

  • Low-speed exercise mode for quieter weekly tests; 61 dB @ 23'
  • Two-Line LCD Display provides service and maintenance intervals
  • Powerful Generac 2.4L 4-cylinder liquid-cooled engine
  • Corrosion-resistant material ideal for salty air conditions
  • True power technology delivers best-in class power quality with less than 5% total harmonic distortion (THD) for clean, smooth operation of sensitive electronics and appliances
  • Lockable, external viewing window for quick status check
  • High coolant temp, low coolant, low oil pressure and overspeed
  • Easily check generator status via computer, tablet or smartphone
  • Customize your system based on your actual application
  • Evolution controller a cutting-edge, intuitive control, the evolution controller features a multilingual, 2-line LCD text display with color-coded, backlit buttons, it has received upgrades, including USB flash capability, smart battery charging, voltage adjustment and backlit membrane pad style buttons
  • True power technology delivers best-in class power quality with less than 5% total harmonic distortion (THD) for clean, smooth operation of sensitive electronics and appliances

GENERAC GUARDIAN SERIES 45KW GENERATOR FEATURES AND BENEFITS
This generator provides essential circuit power protection for your home during a power outage, ensuring that essential appliances maintain power. This standby generator is automatic and offers protection year-round, for less than the cost of central air conditioning.
Every Guardian Series home standby generator comes with Mobile Link™ Remote Monitoring. Remote Monitoring is FREE, and allows you to monitor the status of your generator from anywhere in the world. Use a smartphone, PC, or tablet to access generator information, such as the current operating status and maintenance alerts. By connecting your account you have access to authorized service dealers for fast, friendly, and proactive service.
Generac generators are ideal for weathering storms and power outages. Their automatic backup power gives you piece of mind that your home and appliances are protected.
Generac generators and engines are designed, engineered and assembled in the USA using domestic and foreign parts.
The Generac G-Force Engine is built to handle the stressors of generator use. This results in power that’s more reliable and requires less routine maintenance than competitor engines. Generac’s new G-Force engine is purpose built and pressure-lubricated. It features hydraulic lifters, which improve engine performance and extending the life of the product. (Hydraulic lifters only available on the 13 & 16 kW.)
